message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $110.
Thanks for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Let's try $100 as the final price for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're really close to your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I believe $100 is the most I can offer for the product.
